record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--S. 761

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that on Friday, April 20, at 10:30 a.m, the Senate proceed to the consideration of Calendar No. 70, S. 761, the America COMPETES Act, and that during Friday's session there be debate only with no amendments in order to the bill; further, that on Tuesday, April 24, during consideration of S. 761, Senator Coburn be recognized to speak for 1 hour.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
